#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long long int count=0;
    long long int t;
    cin>>t;
    long long int m,n;
    while(t-->0)
    {
       cin>>m>>n;int min=INT_MAX;
       if(m>=n)
       count=m-n;
       else
        {
         while(m<n)
         {
             if(n%2!=0){n++;count++;}
             n/=2;count++;
         }
         count+=m-n;
        }
       cout<< count<< endl;
       count=0;
    }
}
